messages.speaker: therapist
messages.text: Hi! I'm Anita Bhargava. Strategic wealth building with modern perspective. I'm here to help you understand your financial lifestyle and goals. To get started, could you please tell me your name?

messages.speaker: therapist
messages.text: Welcome, I'm Anita Bhargava, strategic financial advisor and co-founder of Bharosa Club. I'm excited to explore your financial journey together and help create a plan that aligns with both your values and ambitions. Today, we'll focus on understanding your lifestyle aspirations and preferences - not just numbers, but what truly matters to you. This foundation will help us develop strategies for building sustainable wealth that supports the life you envision. Let's start by getting to know each other. Could you please tell me your name and age?
